Note: Signed "G. Capon" and "Geo Dorival" "Visa 16.067" appears on the bottom left of the poster. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text in French tells about the dawn of the peace which also brings a menace to France which is tuberculosis. It must be vanquished. Illustration shows a field with houses against a yellow background. A cloud appears to be rising in the background.
